titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 1-ethyl-6-fluoro-1,4-dihydro-4-oxo-7-(1-piperazinyl)-3-quinolinecarboxcylic acid (norfloxin).

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12244)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 9/22/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on 1-ethyl-6-fluoro-1,4-dihydro-4-oxo-7-(1-piperazinyl)-3- quinolinecarboxylic acid (also known as norfloxacin).
